messages.content: How can I run the webcam node?
The webcam node needs to be run at localhost/https.
Where can I find the webcam node?
The node can be found under Webcam/Webcam Capture.
How do I start using the webcam?
Press start capture to start using the camera.
What is the purpose of the auto queue option?
The auto queue option allows you to keep creating images from the webcam input using the seed trick.
